LEESPORK_JAM5_ERNESTO.Name: Easter Egg
LEESPORK_JAM5_ERNESTO.Description: Find Geswaldo and tell Ernesto about him.

LEESPORK_JAM5_BAD_ENDING.Name: Bad Ending
LEESPORK_JAM5_BAD_ENDING.Description: Fail so hard at finding Leuc's cat that they kill you

LEESPORK_JAM5_GOOD_GRAVE.Name: In Peace
LEESPORK_JAM5_GOOD_GRAVE.Description: Read the grave after returning the cat and talking to Leuc.

LEESPORK_JAM5_SPECIAL_THANKS.Name: Special Thanks
LEESPORK_JAM5_SPECIAL_THANKS.Description: Make it through the special thanks credits which are unlocked after completing the mod once.
